--create topic sensor_readings;
use test;
0 rows returned
create source latest_sensor_readings(
    sensor_id bigint,
    country varchar,
    city varchar,
    reading_1 bigint,
    reading_2 double,
    reading_3 decimal(10,2),
    primary key (sensor_id)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "sensor_readings",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        "k.k0",
        "v.v1",
        "v.v2",
        "v.v3",
        "v.v4",
        "v.v5"
    )
    properties = (
    )
);
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_1;

select * from latest_sensor_readings order by sensor_id;
|sensor_id|country|city|reading_1|reading_2|reading_3|
|1|uk|london|1000|192.23|123456.33|
|2|usa|new york|-1501|-563.34|-765432.34|
|3|au|sydney|372|7890.765|98766554.34|
|4|uk|london|2012|675.21|9873.74|
|5|uk|bristol|-192|-876.23|-736464.38|
|6|usa|new york|-346|-763.97|252673.83|
|7|au|melbourne|0|764.32|9686.12|
|8|uk|bristol|453|9867.99|87475.36|
|9|usa|san francisco|-3736|-543.12|-8575.38|
|10|au|sydney|2163|0|-38373.36|
10 rows returned

-- MIN;
-- ===;

-- No group by;

create materialized view test_mv_1 as select min(reading_1) from latest_sensor_readings;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_1;
|min(reading_1)|
|-3736|
1 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_2 as select min(reading_2) from latest_sensor_readings;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_2;
|min(reading_2)|
|-876.23|
1 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_3 as select min(reading_3) from latest_sensor_readings;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_3;
|min(reading_3)|
|-765432.340000000000000000000000000000|
1 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_4 as select min(reading_1) from latest_sensor_readings having min(reading_1) < 0;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_4;
|min(reading_1)|
|-3736|
1 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_5 as select min(reading_2) from latest_sensor_readings having min(reading_2) < 0;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_5;
|min(reading_2)|
|-876.23|
1 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_6 as select min(reading_3) from latest_sensor_readings having min(reading_3) < 0;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_6;
|min(reading_3)|
|-765432.340000000000000000000000000000|
1 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_7 as select min(reading_1) from latest_sensor_readings having min(reading_1) > 0;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_7;
|min(reading_1)|
0 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_8 as select min(reading_2) from latest_sensor_readings having min(reading_2) > 0;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_8;
|min(reading_2)|
0 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_9 as select min(reading_3) from latest_sensor_readings having min(reading_3) > 0;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_9;
|min(reading_3)|
0 rows returned

-- Group by one column;

create materialized view test_mv_10 as select country, min(reading_1) from latest_sensor_readings group by country;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_10 order by country;
|country|min(reading_1)|
|au|0|
|uk|-192|
|usa|-3736|
3 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_11 as select country, min(reading_2) from latest_sensor_readings group by country;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_11 order by country;
|country|min(reading_2)|
|au|0|
|uk|-876.23|
|usa|-763.97|
3 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_12 as select country, min(reading_3) from latest_sensor_readings group by country;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_12 order by country;
|country|min(reading_3)|
|au|-38373.360000000000000000000000000000|
|uk|-736464.380000000000000000000000000000|
|usa|-765432.340000000000000000000000000000|
3 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_13 as select country, min(reading_1) from latest_sensor_readings group by country having min(reading_1) > -500;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_13 order by country;
|country|min(reading_1)|
|au|0|
|uk|-192|
2 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_14 as select country, min(reading_2) from latest_sensor_readings group by country having min(reading_2) > -800;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_14 order by country;
|country|min(reading_2)|
|au|0|
|usa|-763.97|
2 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_15 as select country, min(reading_3) from latest_sensor_readings group by country having min(reading_3) < -50000;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_15 order by country;
|country|min(reading_3)|
|uk|-736464.380000000000000000000000000000|
|usa|-765432.340000000000000000000000000000|
2 rows returned

-- Group by two columns;

create materialized view test_mv_16 as select country, city, min(reading_1) from latest_sensor_readings group by country, city;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_16 order by country, city;
|country|city|min(reading_1)|
|au|melbourne|0|
|au|sydney|372|
|uk|bristol|-192|
|uk|london|1000|
|usa|new york|-1501|
|usa|san francisco|-3736|
6 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_17 as select country, city, min(reading_2) from latest_sensor_readings group by country, city;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_17 order by country, city;
|country|city|min(reading_2)|
|au|melbourne|764.32|
|au|sydney|0|
|uk|bristol|-876.23|
|uk|london|192.23|
|usa|new york|-763.97|
|usa|san francisco|-543.12|

create materialized view test_mv_18 as select country, city, min(reading_3) from latest_sensor_readings group by country, city;

|uk|london|9873.740000000000000000000000000000|
|usa|new york|-765432.340000000000000000000000000000|
|usa|san francisco|-8575.380000000000000000000000000000|

create materialized view test_mv_19 as select country, city, min(reading_1) from latest_sensor_readings group by country, city having min(reading_1) > 1;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_19 order by country, city;
|country|city|min(reading_1)|
|au|sydney|372|
|uk|london|1000|
2 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_20 as select country, city, min(reading_2) from latest_sensor_readings group by country, city having min(reading_2) > 1;

select * from test_mv_20 order by country, city;
|country|city|min(reading_2)|
|au|melbourne|764.32|
|uk|london|192.23|
2 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_21 as select country, city, min(reading_3) from latest_sensor_readings group by country, city having min(reading_3) > 1;

select * from test_mv_21 order by country, city;
|country|city|min(reading_3)|
|au|melbourne|9686.120000000000000000000000000000|
|uk|london|9873.740000000000000000000000000000|
2 rows returned

-- without aggregate in projection;

create materialized view test_mv_22 as select country, city from latest_sensor_readings group by country, city having min(reading_1) > 1;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_22 order by country, city;
|country|city|
|au|sydney|
|uk|london|
2 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_23 as select country, city from latest_sensor_readings group by country, city having min(reading_2) > 1;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_23 order by country, city;
|country|city|
|au|melbourne|
|uk|london|
2 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_24 as select country, city from latest_sensor_readings group by country, city having min(reading_3) > 1;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_24 order by country, city;
|country|city|
|au|melbourne|
|uk|london|
2 rows returned
